title: Stadionul CMC
text: Stadionul CMC, also known as Stadionul TCI, is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Cluj-Napoca">Cluj-Napoca</a>, <a href="Romania">Romania</a>. It is used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="CFR%20Cluj">CFR Cluj</a> Academy. The stadium holds 3,000 people and is also used for <a href="CFR%20Cluj">CFR Cluj</a>'s youth center squads matches and trainings.
